title: 求助C#启动器问题。使用%appdata%/.minecraft目录启动游戏资源文件位置问题
author: 小E
txt_content:
本帖最后由 小E 于 2015-9-7 21:07 编辑 





QQ截图20150907210246.jpg (62.58 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2015-9-7 21:00 上传




本来应该在.minecraft目录下的文件都跑启动器根目录下了。所有资源文件读取不到

启动信息

javaw.exe                               "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\javaw.exe" -Xincgc -Xms512M -Xmx2048M -Dfml.ignoreInvalidMinecraftCertificates=true -Dfml.ignorePatchDiscrepancies=true -Djava.library.path="C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\natives" -cp "C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\net\minecraftforge\forge\1.7.10-10.13.4.1448-1.7.10\forge-1.7.10-10.13.4.1448-1.7.10.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\net\minecraft\launchwrapper\1.11\launchwrapper-1.11.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\org\ow2\asm\asm-all\5.0.3\asm-all-5.0.3.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\com\typesafe\akka\akka-actor_2.11\2.3.3\akka-actor_2.11-2.3.3.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\com\typesafe\config\1.2.1\config-1.2.1.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\org\scala-lang\scala-actors-migration_2.11\1.1.0\scala-actors-migration_2.11-1.1.0.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\org\scala-lang\scala-compiler\2.11.1\scala-compiler-2.11.1.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\org\scala-lang\plugins\scala-continuations-library_2.11\1.0.2\scala-continuations-library_2.11-1.0.2.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\org\scala-lang\plugins\scala-continuations-plugin_2.11.1\1.0.2\scala-continuations-plugin_2.11.1-1.0.2.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\org\scala-lang\scala-library\2.11.1\scala-library-2.11.1.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\org\scala-lang\scala-parser-combinators_2.11\1.0.1\scala-parser-combinators_2.11-1.0.1.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\org\scala-lang\scala-reflect\2.11.1\scala-reflect-2.11.1.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\org\scala-lang\scala-swing_2.11\1.0.1\scala-swing_2.11-1.0.1.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\org\scala-lang\scala-xml_2.11\1.0.2\scala-xml_2.11-1.0.2.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\lzma\lzma\0.0.1\lzma-0.0.1.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\net\sf\jopt-simple\jopt-simple\4.5\jopt-simple-4.5.jar;C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\com\google\guava\guava\17.0\gu net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch --username _xiaoe --version 1.7.10-Forge10.13.4.1448-1.7.10 --gameDir . --assetsDir assets --assetIndex 1.7.10 --uuid 9f55a761fc7c4df1bd8bc416add7a038 --accessToken 0e70b5d32291498898724d8ea34a920a --userProperties {} --userType mojang --tweakClass cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker

replies.author: mcmny
replies.txt_content:
首先，应是--gameDir C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft
--assetsDir C:\Users\xiaoe\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\assets
其实我不太推荐启动器与.minecraft文件夹不在同一目录，如果不在同一目录的话很容易出现地址错误等问题。。。。
你的这个启动代码是通过其他与.minecraft文件夹在同一目录的启动器获取的，地址错误就在所难免了。。。
也许还有些错误我没看出来
